mapper.select: SELECT lhlxtjb.tjrq,sum(lhlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by lhlxtjb.lhlxdm,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc

SELECT sum(lhlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by lhlxtjb.lhlxdm ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc ORDER BY lhlxtjb.tjrq desc
